page.title: 15CLOTHES
page.content: People wear a very wide variety of clothes. T_shirts, cord trousers, jeans, anoraks and track/boiler suits are unisex, particularly for leisure and manual work, though some women prefer skirts. Riders are seen wearing stretch trousers, neat jacket and protective hat. Winter coats may be light_weight padded showerproof or wool/fibre. In summer T_shirts and shorts or sleeveless dresses are favoured. This year younger women are wearing pastle baggy trousers and loose tops or all_in_one suits. Men mostly keep long light_weight trousers and open_necked shirts with short or rolled_up sleeves. Uniform blazers and ties or colour and style of dresses distinguish between schools. In offices and shops dress is more formal: dark suits and ties, or neat skirts, blouses and jackets.
